name: Duceti Motor Racing
description:
Racing, ride your duceti monster motor bike with high speed, around highway and nice fantastic environment. Very thrilling and relaxing with some more drifting your bike on highway. Just take your dream duceti monster motor bike and do your racing.
This is very basic of racing , ride motor circle game
Features:
- Amazing graphics of duceti monster motor bike , highland environment
- Simple controls to control and ride your dream motor circle duceti monster on nice environment of highland
- Gas, break buttons to race your racing , ride duceti monster motor bike
- Swing your device to control your duceti monster motor circle steer
- Automatic gear of your racing , ride duceti monster motor bike
- Camera button to change your view of racing , ride duceti monster motor circle
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ljeV8Z9kFcM&feature=youtu.be
